SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.entities.factories

Class PetFactory

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.entities.factories.LoadedFactory
com.csse3200.game.entities.factories.PetFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
public class PetFactory extends LoadedFactory
Factory to create non-playable character (NPC) entities with predefined components.

Each NPC entity type should have a creation method that returns a corresponding entity. Predefined entity properties can be loaded from configs stored as json files which are defined in "NPCConfigs".

If needed, this factory can be separated into more specific factories for entities with similar characteristics.
